review_blob:
This is probably the first IPA brewed in Colombia. And it is also a good first attempt. Like any IPA, this beer has a pronounced herbal flavor, some floral scent and a very powerful bitter taste. This beer is matured for two weeks and has 5  alcohol proof.

Good work with the hops, couldve been better on the cereals. If you enjoy bitter Ales, youll like this beer.
